Name: Ski3
About the game: Ski3 si all about smooth and unending skiing, on a mountain with hidden dangers and beautiful locations. The game features: -Day/Dusk/Night cycle, -Random weather (from clear sky to heavy blizzard), -Software raytracing (not hardware, it will work on both AMD and non RTX cards) with very good performance and quality, -Different obstacles, different handling based on surface and much more. -Live leaderboards! The score multiplier is based on difficulty level. The higher the difficulty, the higher the score multiplier. I consider the game in late alpha, it is more or less bug free, but I still need to implement some things such as : change the placeholder character model / yeti model, add animations, a little bit more flavor to the map, and more random and unexpected obstacles. Also more infinite maps with different themes, such as a densely forest, a Snow mountain that so happened to be an unknown volcano, etc.
